menuRateNow.description: Label of the rate now menu button.

menuRateLater.description: Label of the rate-later menu button.

menuAnalysis.description: Label of the analysis menu button.

contextMenuRateLater.description: Label of the rate-later menu item (after right-click on a link).

recommendedByTournesol.description: Title of the main Tournesol container.

learnMore.description: Invite the users to learn more about the project (should be very short).

refreshRecommendations.description: Button title to refresh the Tournesol container content with other videos.

seeMoreRecommendations.description: Button title to expand the Tournesol container to show more recommended videos.

views.description: Display the number of views of a video.

publishedToday.description: Date displayed for vides published today.

publishedYesterday.description: Date displayed for video published yesterday.

publishedSomeDaysAgo.description: Date displayed for videos published less than two weeks ago.

publishedSomeWeeksAgo.description: Date displayed for videos published between two weeks ago and one month ago.

publishedAMonthAgo.description: Date displayed for videos published one month ago.

publishedSomeMonthsAgo.description: Date displayed for videos published between two month ago and one year ago.

publishedAYearAgo.description: Date displayed for videos published one year ago.

publishedSomeYearsAgo.description: Date displayed for videos published more than one year ago.

comparisonsBy.description: Number of comparisons involving the video.

comparisonsContributors.description: Number of contributors that rated the video.

layman_friendly.description: Full name of the criterion 'layman friendly'.

better_habits.description: Full name of the criterion 'better habits'.

backfire_risk.description: Full name of the criterion 'backfire risk'.

ratedHigh.description: Label of the criterion with the highest positive score.

ratedLow.description: Label of the criterion with the lowest negative score.

viewMore.Description: Invite the users to see more results on the Tournesol website.

securityIconAlt.description: Alt text of the icon displayed when there's a security advisory banner

campaignIconAlt.description: Alt text of the megaphone icon displayed when there's a generic banner

closeIconAlt.description: Alt text of the close icon displayed when there's a banner

alertNotYoutubeVideo.message: This is not a YouTube video.
alertNotYoutubeVideo.description: Alert shown when trying to use on a non-YouTube video link/page

alertVideoAdded.description: Alert message indicating a video was added successfully

alertAlreadyAdded.description: Alert message indicating a video was already added

alertFailed.description: Alert message indicating an action failed

rateNowButtonLabel.description: Label of the button displayed on video pages.

rateLaterButtonLabel.description: Label of the button displayed on video pages.

rateLaterButtonSuccessLabel.description: It replaces the Rate Later button label after a successful add.

watchOnTournesolButtonLabel.description: Label of the button displayed on video pages.

rateLaterHistoryImportButton.description: Label of the button displayed on the YouTube history page to import the history into your 'rate later' list.

rateLaterHistoryStatusBoxTitle.description: Title of the the rate later history import status box.

rateLaterHistoryStatusBox429AlertP1.description: First paragraph of the alert message, displayed when the daily import limit is reached.

rateLaterHistoryStatusBox429AlertP2.message: You have imported the maximum number of videos allowed today. You can start a new import in 24 hours.
rateLaterHistoryStatusBox429AlertP2.description: Second paragraph of the alert message, displayed when the daily import limit is reached.

rateLaterHistoryStatusBoxMessage.message: Press Stop when the visible videos count doesn't increase anymore or when you think enough videos have been imported.
rateLaterHistoryStatusBoxMessage.description: Instructions displayed on the rate later history import status box.

rateLaterHistoryVideoCount.description: Label showing the count of videos found in the YouTube history during import.

rateLaterHistoryProcessedCount.description: Label showing the count of videos processed by the import.

rateLaterHistorySentCount.description: Label showing the number of sent videos successfully imported in the rate later list (including those already present).

rateLaterHistorySkippedCount.description: Label showing the number of videos that have NOT been sent to the Tournesol server, because they were present in the cache of previously imported videos.

rateLaterHistoryFailureCount.description: Label showing the count of sent videos that failed to be added to the rate later list, because of a server error.

rateLaterHistoryCloseButtonLabel.description: Label of the button to close the import status box, when the import is over.

rateLaterHistoryStopButtonLabel.description: Label of the button to stop the YouTube history import process.
